install.name: CN Photos
install.author: Caleb Nance
install.description: Thanks so much for downloading CN Photos! Leave a review on Joomla Extensions Directory if you have some time, and donations to the future of this module and all other extensions are always appreciated! Please let me know of any bugs or things that you would want to see added or changed contact me - http://demo.calebnance.com/Contact/Caleb-Nance.html - Hope you enjoy! Have a great day.

param.name: modid
param.label: Set Module ID
param.description: Set this to a different id, so you can have multiple modules on one page.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Module Suffix for the module class.

param.name: path
param.label: Image Path
param.description: This is the path to the folder of all the images that you want to show up in the slideshow

param.name: border
param.label: Show Border on Images
param.description: If this is set to yes, then there will be a 10px border around the images. (Rounded in FF and Chrome)

param.name: bordercolor
param.label: Border Color
param.description: Hex color of the border (if border is to be shown)

param.name: random
param.label: Randomize Images
param.description: If this is set to yes, then the images in the folder you've selected will be displayed in random order instead of by name.

param.name: fx
param.label: Animation
param.description: Select which effect you would like the images to be transitioned with..

param.name: pause
param.label: Pause On Hover
param.description: If this is set to yes, then when the user hovers over the image, it pauses everything from moving.

param.name: next
param.label: Next Slide On Click
param.description: If this is set to yes, then when the user clicks on the image, it goes to the next image.

param.name: timeout
param.label: Time on Each Slide
param.description: This is the time for which each slide is paused on.

param.name: speed
param.label: Speed of Annimation
param.description: This is the time at which the annimation happens.

param.name: shuffle
param.label: Suffle Options
param.description: This is if the shuffle is selected under animation, then you can select how you want it to shuffle.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
